page.title: 06BIOGRAPHY
page.content: ASHRIDGE NURSING HOME HAS 23 RESIDENTS,WHERE MRS JEFCOATE LIVES NOW.MRS JEFCOATE WAS BORN IN INDIA,CAME TO ENGLAND AT THE AGE OF 6, BUT RETURNED AT 16 TO GET MARRIED. HER HUSBAND WAS IN THE ARMY IN 1922 IN INDIA,RETIRING TO ENGLAND.SHE LIKES BEXHILL BUT DOES NOT GET MANY VISITORS NOW.SHE HAS BEEN IN THE HOME FOR 2 YEARS.HER HOBBIES ARE KNITTING AND READING,BUT HER EYESIGHT IS POOR AND SHE HAS VERY THICK GLASSES.SHE WAKES AT 5.30 AM AND LISTENS TO THE RADIO A LOT.SHE HAS BREAKFAST AT 7.HER FAVOURITE FOOD IS CURRY.SHE USED TO ENJOY GOING TO THE PARK AND SWIMMING BUT SHE IS TOO OLD NOW.SHE WOULD LIKE TO SEE A PUBLIC SWIMMING POOL BUILT IN BEXHILL.
